changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users( id bigserial PRIMARY KEY, first_name varchar(100) NOT NULL, second_name varchar(100) NOT NULL, middle_name varchar(100) NOT NULL, birthday date, phone varchar(12), email varchar NOT NULL, password varchar NOT NULL, blocked boolean default false, role_id bigint, created_at timestamptz default current_timestamp, deleted_at timestamptz );
